titleStmt.title: An order of His Highness, with the advice and consent of His Privy Council, for continuing the Committee for the Army; and for the more orderly paiment, and issuing forth of the three moneths assessment of sixty thousand pounds by the moneth, commencing the 25th of March, 1657· At the council at Whitehall, the 14th of July 1657.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
